#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#define pn(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define pl(n) printf("%I64d\n",n)
#define rn(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define rf(n) scanf("%lf",&n)
#define rs(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define rc(n) cin>>c
#define ps(n) printf("%s\n",n)
#define pf(n) printf("%lf\n",n)
#define rl(n) scanf("%I64d",&n)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=(int)a; i < (int)b; i++)
#define FORD(i,a,b) for(int i=(int)a; i >= (int)b; i--)
#define Big long long int
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector<int>
#define si set<int>
#define sl set<Big>
#define vl vector<Big>
#define itv vi :: iterator
#define its si :: iterator
#define MAX(a,b) (a>b?a:b)
#define MIN(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
#define fill(s,v) memset(s,v,sizeof(s))
#define val(n) (*n)
#define all(s) s.begin(),s.end()
#define FORs(i,s) for(its i = s.begin(); i != s.end(); i++)
#define INF 1000000009
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
#define ll long long int
#include<time.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if(b==0)return a;
    else return gcd(b,a%b);
}
main()
{
    int t, p, q,y,num;
    rn(t);
    while(t--)
    {
       rn(p);
       rn(q);
       y = 0;
    num = gcd(p,q);
    p /= num;
    q /= num;
    num = q;
    while(!(num&1)){
        num>>=1;
        y++;
    }
    num = (1<<y)+q;
    if(num>=p){
        while(!(num&1)){
            num>>=1;
        }
        while(!(p&1)){
            p>>=1;
        }
        if(num==1 && p==1)ps("YES");
        else ps("NO");
    }
    else ps("NO");
    }
return 0;
}
